trans-unit.source: Contains properties that are used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Содержит свойства, которые используются для ограничения набора <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> объектов, возвращаемых при вызове <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A SqlTrackingQueryOptions contains properties that are used to constrain the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method against the tracking data in a database used by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]SqlTrackingQueryOptions содержит свойства, которые используются для ограничения набора <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>объектов, возвращаемый <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>метод по данным отслеживания в базе данных, используемые <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> in the collection of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> must correspond to a workflow instance which has tracking data associated with it in the database that meets the conditions specified by the properties of the SqlTrackingQueryOptions.
trans-unit.target: Каждый <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>в коллекции <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>объектов, возвращаемых при вызове <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>должен соответствовать экземпляр рабочего процесса, в котором содержатся данные отслеживания, связанные с ним в базе данных, удовлетворяющие условиям, указанным в свойствах SqlTrackingQueryOptions.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Инициализирует новый экземпляр <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"> </xref> класса.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: В следующей таблице показаны исходные значения свойств для экземпляра <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>класса.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| These values specify that a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> should return a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.
trans-unit.target: | Свойство | Значение | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>| <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>| <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>| Пустой <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>| Пустая ссылка (`Nothing` в Visual Basic). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>| Пустая ссылка (`Nothing` в Visual Basic). | Эти значения указывают, что вызов <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>должен возвращать <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>объекта для каждого экземпляра рабочего процесса, имеющего данные отслеживания в базе данных.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Resets the properties of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"></xref> to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Сбрасывает свойства <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"> </xref> значения по умолчанию.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: В следующей таблице показаны исходные значения свойств для экземпляра <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>класса.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| These values specify that a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> should return a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.
trans-unit.target: | Свойство | Значение | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>| <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>| <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>| Пустой <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>| Пустая ссылка (`Nothing` в Visual Basic). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>| Пустая ссылка (`Nothing` в Visual Basic). | Эти значения указывают, что вызов <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>должен возвращать <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>объекта для каждого экземпляра рабочего процесса, имеющего данные отслеживания в базе данных.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the upper limit of the time period that, together with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает или задает <xref:System.DateTime>указывающий верхнюю границу периода времени, вместе с <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, используется для ограничения набора <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> объектов, возвращаемых при вызове <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and StatusMaxDateTime, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>ограничивает набор <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>объектов, возвращенный вызовом <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, теми экземплярами рабочего процесса,</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> иметь <xref:System.Type>указано, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>что имеют состояние, указанный <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>во время периода, заданного свойствами <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>и извлечения данных, который соответствует хотя бы один из <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>объектов, заданные <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> StatusMaxDateTime и что</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value specified by StatusMaxDateTime is inclusive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>Значения, указанного в StatusMaxDateTime включительно.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Дополнительные сведения о сопоставления состояния экземпляра рабочего процесса см. в разделе <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>свойство.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Настроек [!NOTE] настроек Если `WorkflowStatus` имеет значение null, затем `StatusMaxDateTime` и `StatusMinDateTime` учитываются.

trans-unit.source: All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called.
trans-unit.target: Все экземпляры рабочих процессов будут возвращены при `GetWorkflows` вызывается.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the upper limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>, Указывающий верхнюю границу периода времени, используемого для поиска совпадающих экземпляров рабочих процессов с состояние, заданное свойством <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Значение по умолчанию — <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.DateTime> that, together with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает или задает <xref:System.DateTime>, вместе с <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, используется для ограничения набора <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> объектов, возвращаемых при вызове <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by StatusMinDateTime and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>ограничивает набор <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>объектов, возвращаемых при вызове <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, теми экземплярами рабочего процесса, которые имеют <xref:System.Type>заданные <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, имеющих состояние, заданное свойством <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>во время периода, заданного свойствами StatusMinDateTime и <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, извлекли данные, соответствующие хотя бы один из <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>объектов, заданные <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value specified by StatusMinDateTime is inclusive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>Значения, указанного в StatusMinDateTime включительно.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Дополнительные сведения о сопоставления состояния экземпляра рабочего процесса см. в разделе <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>свойство.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Настроек [!NOTE] настроек Если `WorkflowStatus` имеет значение null, затем `StatusMaxDateTime` и `StatusMinDateTime` учитываются.

trans-unit.source: All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called.
trans-unit.target: Все экземпляры рабочих процессов будут возвращены при `GetWorkflows` вызывается.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the lower limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>, Указывающий нижнюю границу периода времени, используемого для поиска совпадающих экземпляров рабочих процессов с состояние, заданное свойством <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Значение по умолчанию — <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of data extract values which are used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает или задает список извлеченных значений данных, которые используются для ограничения набора <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> объектов, возвращаемых при вызове <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by TrackingDataItems.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>ограничивает набор <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>объектов, возвращаемых при вызове <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>для этих экземпляров рабочих процессов <xref:System.Type>заданные <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, имеющих состояние, заданное свойством <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>во время периода, заданного свойствами <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>и <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, извлекли данные, соответствующие хотя бы один из <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>объекты, указанные по TrackingDataItems.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName> can contain <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> records that contain data that is extracted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>или <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>может содержать <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>записи, содержащие данные, извлеченные из рабочего процесса.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The TrackingDataItems property contains <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects that specify certain values for this extracted data.
trans-unit.target: Свойство TrackingDataItems содержит <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>объекты, которые указывают определенные значения для этого данные извлекались.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance meets the other criteria specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> and TrackingDataItems is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the extracted data stored in the database for a workflow instance must match one or more of the extracted data values specified by the TrackingDataItems property for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object to be returned for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Если экземпляр рабочего процесса отвечает другим критериям, заданным <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>и TrackingDataItems не является пустой ссылкой (`Nothing`), извлеченные данные, хранящиеся в базе данных для экземпляра рабочего процесса должен полностью соответствовать одному или нескольким значениям извлеченных данных указанного в свойстве TrackingDataItems для <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>возвращался для экземпляра рабочего процесса.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: If TrackingDataItems is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by the values of the extracted data for any of the workflow instances in the database.
trans-unit.target: Если TrackingDataItems является пустой ссылкой (`Nothing`), набор <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>возвращаемых объектов не будет ограничиваться значениями извлеченных данных для всех экземпляров рабочих процессов в базе данных.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue"></xref> objects that contains specified values to be matched for data extracted from the workflow instance or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Объект <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> из <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue"> </xref> объектов, содержащая указанные значения для сравнения для данных, извлеченных из экземпляра рабочего процесса или пустая ссылка (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> в Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"></xref> value that is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает или задает <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"> </xref> значение, используемое для ограничения набора <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> объектов, возвращаемых при вызове <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by WorkflowStatus during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>ограничивает набор <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>объектов, возвращаемых при вызове <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, теми экземплярами рабочего процесса, которые имеют <xref:System.Type>заданные <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, имеющих состояние, заданное свойством WorkflowStatus в течение времени, заданного свойством <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>и <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, извлекли данные, соответствующие хотя бы один из <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>объектов, заданные <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance is considered to have a status that matches WorkflowStatus if the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> received for that workflow instance before or during the specified time period has its <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property set to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> value that maps to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName> value specified by WorkflowStatus.
trans-unit.target: Экземпляр рабочего процесса считается имеет состояние, которое соответствует WorkflowStatus, если последний <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>полученных для этого экземпляра рабочего процесса до или во время заданного периода времени его <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>свойству присвоено <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>значение, сопоставленное с <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>значение, заданное параметром WorkflowStatus.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow instance must have a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> that is configured for the appropriate <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: Таким образом <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>для рабочего процесса экземпляр должен иметь <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>, настроенный для соответствующей <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName>значение.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values that have been sent in workflow tracking records can be matched.
trans-unit.target: Только <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>значения, которые были отправлены в записи отслеживания рабочего процесса могут быть сопоставлены.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: If no workflow tracking records have been sent for the workflow instance, the workflow instance is considered to have a status of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Если никаких записей отслеживания рабочего процесса был отправлен для экземпляра рабочего процесса, экземпляр рабочего процесса считается со статусом <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the mapping between <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> values.
trans-unit.target: В следующей таблице показаны сопоставления между <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>значения и <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>значения.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: |TrackingWorkflowEvent value|WorkflowStatus value| |---------------------------------|--------------------------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| If WorkflowStatus is null (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by status; in other words, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: | Значение «trackingworkflowevent» | Значение «WorkflowStatus» | |---------------------------------|--------------------------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| Если WorkflowStatus имеет значение null (`Nothing`), набор <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>возвращаемых объектов не будет ограничиваться состоянием; другими словами, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>объект будет возвращаться для любого экземпляра рабочего процесса, который соответствует параметрам, указанным в свойствах <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"></xref> values or null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Один из <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"> </xref> значения или значения null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> в Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The default is null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: Значение по умолчанию — null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the workflow instance <xref:System.Type> that is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает или задает экземпляр рабочего процесса <xref:System.Type>, используемый для ограничения набора <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> объектов, возвращаемых при вызове <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by WorkflowType, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>ограничивает набор <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>объектов, возвращаемых при вызове <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, теми экземплярами рабочего процесса, которые имеют <xref:System.Type>заданные WorkflowType, имеющих состояние, заданное свойством <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>во время периода, заданного свойствами <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>и <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, извлекли данные, соответствующие хотя бы один из <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>объектов, заданные <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: If WorkflowType is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by workflow <xref:System.Type>; in other words, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Если WorkflowType является пустой ссылкой (`Nothing`), набор <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>возвращаемых объектов не будет ограничиваться рабочего процесса <xref:System.Type>другими словами, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>объект будет возвращаться для любого экземпляра рабочего процесса, что удовлетворяет параметры, указанным в других свойствах <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The default is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Значение по умолчанию — пустая ссылка (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> в Visual Basic).
